# This file was generated by the YaTool build system (https://github.com/yandex/yatool),
# from a source YaTool build configuration provided in ya.make files.
#
# If the repository supports both CMake and ya build configurations, please modify both of them.
#
# If only CMake build configuration is supported then modify only CMake files and note that only
# simple modifications are allowed like adding source-files to targets or adding simple properties
# like target_include_directories. These modifications will be ported to original ya.make files
# by maintainers. Any complex modifications which can't be easily ported back to the ya build
# system may be rejected.
#
# Please refer to the build instructions in the repository for more information about manual
# changes in this file.

get_built_tool_path(
  TOOL_rescompiler_bin
  TOOL_rescompiler_dependency
  tools/rescompiler/bin
  rescompiler
)

add_subdirectory(mock)

add_executable(unittester-client)


target_compile_options(unittester-client PRIVATE
  -Wdeprecated-this-capture
  -Wimplicit-fallthrough
)

target_link_libraries(unittester-client PUBLIC
  contrib-libs-cxxsupp
  yutil
  cpp-testing-gtest
  cpp-testing-gtest_main
  yt-yt-build
  yt-core-test_framework
  yt-yt-core
  yt-yt-client
  yt-client-formats
  client-unittests-mock
  yt-library-named_value
  yt_proto-yt-formats
  library-cpp-resource
)

target_allocator(unittester-client
  system_allocator
)

target_link_options(unittester-client PRIVATE
  -Wl,-platform_version,macos,11.0,11.0
  -fPIC
  -fPIC
  -framework
  CoreFoundation
)

target_sources(unittester-client PRIVATE
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt/yt/client/unittests/check_schema_compatibility_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt/yt/client/unittests/check_type_compatibility_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt/yt/client/unittests/chunk_replica_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt/yt/client/unittests/column_sort_schema_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt/yt/client/unittests/comparator_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt/yt/client/unittests/composite_compare_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt/yt/client/unittests/connection_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt/yt/client/unittests/farm_fingerprint_stability_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt/yt/client/unittests/key_bound_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt/yt/client/unittests/key_bound_compressor_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt/yt/client/unittests/key_helpers.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt/yt/client/unittests/key_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt/yt/client/unittests/logical_type_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt/yt/client/unittests/named_yson_token_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt/yt/client/unittests/uuid_text_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt/yt/client/unittests/time_text_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt/yt/client/unittests/node_directory_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt/yt/client/unittests/query_builder_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt/yt/client/unittests/read_limit_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt/yt/client/unittests/replication_card_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt/yt/client/unittests/replication_progress_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt/yt/client/unittests/row_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt/yt/client/unittests/schema_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt/yt/client/unittests/table_consumer_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt/yt/client/unittests/unordered_reader_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt/yt/client/unittests/unversioned_row_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt/yt/client/unittests/validate_logical_type_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt/yt/client/unittests/wire_protocol_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt/yt/client/unittests/ypath_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/yt/yt/client/unittests/50a4baadff663ce8fbdc82d4d2a5691e.cpp
)


add_test(
  NAME
  unittester-client
  COMMAND
  unittester-client
)

set_property(
  TEST
  unittester-client
  PROPERTY
  LABELS
  MEDIUM
)

set_property(
  TEST
  unittester-client
  PROPERTY
  ENVIRONMENT
)

resources(unittester-client
  ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/yt/yt/client/unittests/50a4baadff663ce8fbdc82d4d2a5691e.cpp
  INPUTS
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/library/cpp/type_info/ut/test-data/good-types.txt
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/library/cpp/type_info/ut/test-data/bad-types.txt
  KEYS
  /types/good
  /types/bad
  OPTS
)

vcs_info(unittester-client)

set_property(
  TEST
  unittester-client
  PROPERTY
  PROCESSORS
  1
)
